name: Blocky Snake
description:
Blocky Snake is a scoring arcade runner.
You need to control the snake and collect additional bodies, coins, as well as destroy blocks on the way at the expense of your body and get points for this.
The speed of the game increases with the distance traveled, and also depends on the number of destroyed blocks. The more points you have, the more additional bodies will appear at a time.
You can find 2 types of boosters. The magnet will collect all coins in the nearest radius, and the shield will prevent you from losing bodies during the destruction of blocks.
